UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Novel anoplin-based (lipo)-peptide models show potent antimicrobial activity.
Literature.Author: Stergiou V, Krikorian D, Koukkou A-I, Sakarellos-Daitsiotis M, Panou-Pomonis E

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:15% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:25% Hemolysis=200 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=3µg/ml),Zymomonas mobilis ATCC 10988(MIC=15µg/ml),Mycobacterium smegmatis mc2-155(MIC=20µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis DELTA(MIC=7µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis(MIC=7µg/ml)
